snippet.title: ⚔️ Knights in Tight Spaces | Launch Trailer | Available Now! ⚔️
snippet.description:
The doors are open. Arm yourself and sharpen your wits: It’s time to get medieval.

Knights in Tight Spaces is available now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2315400/Knights_in_Tight_Spaces/

🤜 A stylish, action-packed take on deckbuilders - Fight through challenging scenarios packed with enemies, with strong action-movie visual effects and animations, while vibing with the electronic soundtrack.

👑 Master your surroundings - Position carefully around enemies and obstacles, making sure to keep your tactical advantage. 

🛡️ Gather your party and unveil secrets - Recruit characters and assemble a party to add a new layer of strategic thinking to your runs

⚔️ Find your playstyle - With 300 cards, different classes and gear to equip, and an upgrade system, Knights in Tight Spaces offers countless hours of deckbuilding fun
